pages.text:
ABOUT US
We provide a quality Public Driving Range for residents of Charlotte County, Florida. Visitors are also welcome to use the facility.
​
We will also provide a Junior Golf Program for the Children of Charlotte County

The balls were obviously waterlogged and old. Terrible feedback with ball striking even when getting great contact. Alls the tees are adjustable but do not hold their height. $14 a bucket for mud balls.

Great clean place since the new owners took over. Friendly group of guys. As an added bonus, they have Ice Cream!!

ABOUT US
We provide a quality Public Driving Range for residents of Charlotte County, Florida. Visitors are also welcome to use the facility.
​
We will also provide a Junior Golf Program for the Children of Charlotte County

Our Team
Dedication. Expertise. Passion.
We are a dedicated group that is here to provide the best Driving Range Experience. Whether you're here to practice your golf swing, take part in one of our Clinics, or just have some fun, Our Team will be available to provide you with an unforgettable experience
General Manager
Kevin P. Wantje, PGA
​
​
kevinwantje@gmail.com
Head Professional
Gregory A. Leak, PGA
Golf Instructor
Matthew W. Daubner, PGA
